title: Episode 57: Zimbardo, the Replication Crisis, and the Science of Psychology
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In this episode, Dr. Regan Gurung discusses recent developments regarding the Stanford Prison Experiment along with the "Replication Crisis" in the field of psychology. Plus, we introduce a new segment called "What's Good."

description: In this episode, Dr. Regan Gurung discusses recent developments regarding the Stanford Prison Experiment along with the "Replication Crisis" in the field of psychology. Plus, we introduce a new segment called "What's Good."
